fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Are there disclosure requirements for donations to national election campaigns?

fxInfo_responses.value: No. There are no disclosure requirements.
Not really. There are some, possibly partial, disclosure requirements in place but they are not observed or enforced most of the time.
Ambiguous. There are disclosure requirements in place, but it is unclear to what extent they are observed or enforced.
Mostly. The disclosure requirements may not be fully comprehensive (some donations not covered), but most existing arrangements are observed and enforced.
Yes. There are comprehensive requirements and they are observed and enforced almost all the time.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2eldonate, *_osp, *_ord
